channel.title: untagged on Diary
channel.description: Recent content in untagged on Diary

item.title: New Discovery
item.description: Lately, I was diving into streaming & illustration. Then I realized I must set up my identity in order to got acknowledged by people. Firstly, I registered my own avatar to a certain webservices, so that I don’t need to setup my avatar on other sites again Conclusion, Banzai for Internet

item.title: Anew Life
item.description: Several moments later, I keep thinking about how to recuperate from my hearth break. For example, I’m starting a new activity as a Game Streamer & Illustrator. Also I registered my personal info onto several website. Well, If I just sulk over this then my first love will actually be meaningless. “Now that you’ve get lost, get the courage” - Kaiji
